title: Manly Responsibilities üéô#192
description:
Tyler spent the weekend going to a pumpkin patch (03:36) where he learned his kids are very fast and need to be constantly watched. Ryan talks about how he had a fall themed photoshoot with his kid, and Myles wants to know at what age do parents stop taking photos of their kids. (25:23) Later on in the episode the gang goes over what responsibilities you have as a man, (45:22) Tyler brings up teaching your kid how to pee outside and Myles points out at what point did we go from going to the bathroom outside to using private bathrooms. (58:25) Myles brings up how being a man means knowing the in‚Äôs and out‚Äôs of your TV, and Ryan admits that he struggles operating his surround sound system that‚Äôs attached to his TV. (01:07:03)
